name: Darkmantle
description: Floating black squid-like entities, darkmantles tend to nest in dark, damp environments such as subterranean caves.

effects.name: Floating
effects.description: Darkmantles can freely fly due to their innate magical properties.

effects.name: Darkness Aura
effects.description: An aura of shadow surrounds the darkmantle. Creatures within 2m see as if in darkness, and any light sources (e.g. torch) within 2m are extinguished instantly.

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.description: Melee attack with its fangs, dealing 1d6 piercing damage.

attacks.name: Face Hug
attacks.description: Attempts to grapple a melee target's head (Brawling to resist). A target grappled in this way is blinded and suffocating. A suffocating target must make a CON check each round to hold their breath, on failure taking d6 damage this and every round after. Can be dodged.

attacks.name: Extend Darkness Aura
attacks.description: The darkmantle projects its darkness aura outward, causing all sources of light within 20 meters to be extinguished.
